code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Form,Modal}from"react-bootstrap";import{createBrand}from"../../http/deviceAPI";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateBrand=_ref=>{let{show,onHide}=_ref;const[value,setValue]=useState('');const addBrand=()=>{createBrand({name:value}).then(data=>{setValue('');onHide();});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:show,onHide:onHide,size:"lg",centered:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{children:"Add new Brand"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{placeholder:"Input name your brand...",value:value,onChange:e=>setValue(e.target.value)})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal.Footer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-danger",onClick:onHide,children:"Close"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-success",onClick:()=>addBrand(),children:"Add"})]})]});};export default CreateBrand;
